name: GET_TaxationItem
description: Retrieves the information about a specific taxation item by ID.

Zuora-Track-Id.description:
A custom identifier for tracing the API call. If you set a value for this header, Zuora returns the same value in the response headers. This header enables you to associate your system process identifiers with Zuora API calls, to assist with troubleshooting in the event of an issue.

The value of this field must use the US-ASCII character set and must not include any of the following characters: colon (`:`), semicolon (`;`), double quote (`"`), and quote (`'`).

Zuora-Entity-Ids.description: An entity ID. If you have [Zuora Multi-entity](https://knowledgecenter.zuora.com/BB_Introducing_Z_Business/Multi-entity) enabled and the OAuth token is valid for more than one entity, you must use this header to specify which entity to perform the operation in. If the OAuth token is only valid for a single entity, or you do not have Zuora Multi-entity enabled, you do not need to set this header.

id.description: The unique ID of a taxation item.

$block: Container for custom fields of a Taxation Item object.

$ul: **createdById**: The ID of the Zuora user who created the taxation item.
**createdDate**: The date and time when the taxation item was created in the Zuora system, in `yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss` format.
**exemptAmount**: The calculated tax amount excluded due to the exemption.
**financeInformation**: Container for the finance information related to the taxation item.
**onAccountAccountingCode**: The accounting code that maps to an on account in your accounting system.
**onAccountAccountingCodeType**: The type of the accounting code that maps to an on account in your accounting system.
**salesTaxPayableAccountingCode**: The accounting code for the sales taxes payable.
**salesTaxPayableAccountingCodeType**: The type of the accounting code for the sales taxes payable.
**id**: The ID of the taxation item.
**jurisdiction**: The jurisdiction that applies the tax or VAT. This value is typically a state, province, county, or city.
**locationCode**: The identifier for the location based on the value of the `taxCode` field.
**memoItemId**: The ID of the credit or debit memo associated with the taxation item.
**name**: The name of the taxation item.
**sourceTaxItemId**: The ID of the taxation item of the invoice, which the credit or debit memo is created from.
**success**: Returns `true` if the request was processed successfully.
**taxAmount**: The amount of the tax applied to the credit or debit memo.
**taxCode**: The tax code identifies which tax rules and tax rates to apply to a specific credit or debit memo.
**taxCodeDescription**: The description of the tax code.
**taxDate**: The date when the tax is applied to the credit or debit memo.
**taxRate**: The tax rate applied to the credit or debit memo.
**taxRateDescription**: The description of the tax rate.
**taxRateType**: The type of the tax rate applied to the credit or debit memo.
**updatedById**: The ID of the Zuora user who last updated the taxation item.
**updatedDate**: The date and time when the taxation item was last updated, in `yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss` format.
